dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5305 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1157 West Mission Avenue in Escondido, California, as the “Captain E. Royce Williams Post Office Building”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Issa introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1157 West Mission Avenue in Escondido, California, as the Captain E. Royce Williams Post Office Building.

section.header: Captain E. Royce Williams Post Office Building

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 1157 West Mission Avenue in Escondido, California, shall be known and designated as the Captain E. Royce Williams Post Office Building.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Captain E. Royce Williams Post Office Building.
